text: The 1998–99 Florida Panthers season was their sixth season in the National Hockey League. The Panthers missed the playoffs, but made a big acquisition of Pavel Bure during the season. ==Regular season== ===Final standings=== ==Schedule and results== {| class="wikitable" width="70%" |- !
